long_description: Designed for 29er mountain bikes, the Mavic Crossone 29er Rear Wheel offers dependable performance for singletrack adventures. Sturdy aluminum rims are strengthened where the spokes exert the greatest stress, improving life expectancy and durability. Double-sealed cartridge bearings deliver excellent longevity and smooth spinning. Features 24 straight-pull, bladed spokes laced in a 2-cross pattern for excellent strength, resilience and stiffness. Wheelset comes with rim tape, rear quick-release (QR) skewer, user guide and Presta/Schrader valve converter. The Mavic Crossone 29er Rear Wheel weighs 1,135g.
short_description: Designed for 29er mountain bikes, the Mavic Crossone 29er Rear Wheel offers dependable performance for singletrack adventures.
